content:
WORD TO YOUR MOTHER BROTHER. So check it, we have our selfs here a wiki CxN. This will set us apart from the average clans during our growth especially during KvK. Now you CxN members have tools and information neatly organized to help you proceed on and grow.

WELCOME TO THE MATRIX NEO. Now which pill will you choose. Use the CxN wiki provided or go back to your old life in total battle.

-Nico t(-_-t)
author: Nico MAJORJOHNSON95
